document.full_text: china has found some u.s.-made passenger cars benefited from unfair subsidies, damaging its carmakers, although beijing side-stepped a potential trade row with the united states by not hitting them with duties.
document.title: china rules u.s. carmakers are guilty of dumping
lines_and_colors: china has found some u.s.-made passenger cars benefited from unfair subsidies, damaging its carmakers, although beijing side-stepped a potential trade row with the united states by not hitting them with duties.
